title: Police hunt for Benjamin Willie wanted in connection with kidnap
article: A man is being sought by police in connection with a kidnapping. South Wales Police officers are looking for Benjamin Willie following the apparent abduction last year of a 20-year-old man from Cardiff.Police say the man was driven from Cardiff in a grey Audi Q5 with false number plates to a property in Hemel Hempstead, Hertfordshire. The incident happened between 11 and 12 December 2020, and the man was rescued by officers from several police forces. Hammersmith-born Mr Willie's last known address was in Harrow. He has connections to Hertfordshire and the Midlands. Eleven men from north-west London and Hertfordshire have been charged in connection with the incident and are being held in custody. The victim is being supported by specially trained officers.
